  • Class
    Description
    CubicCurve
    This class maps the value of a stick input to a cubic curve.
    Curve
    This class and its subclasses remap controller stick inputs according to specifics provided of multiple classes of curves.
    ExpCurve
    This class maps the value of a stick input to an exponential curve.
    LinCurve
    This class maps the value of a stick input to a linear curve.
    NoOpCurve
    This class maps the value of a stick input to a linear curve.
    SmoothCubicCurve
    This class maps the value of a stick input to a smooth increase cubic curve.
    SplineCurve
    This class maps the value of a stick input to a spline curve.
    SplineType
    Types of splines that can be used with SplineCurve.
